TopicTitle: planet textures stuck in low quality?

Articles.Content:
so, somehow i managed to get the map view planet textures stuck in lower quality. they look like sh*t. ive tried lots of things, ive deleted my config file, ive messed around with all the settings, nothing works. ive also tried fiddling with the resolution.

as you can see, the background sky is also screwed up.

is anyone else experiencing this? is my ksp build corrupted or something?

edit: after posting this i realize it belongs in teh support thread :/ of some1 could move it it would be much appreciated

I've never had that problem, but I occasionally get some graphics weirdness that goes away if I restart the program. And more rarely I get some serious graphics weirdness (rapidly flashing multicolored polygons all over the screen) that went away only after I restarted my computer.
